parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets provided player's Voice over Network (VoN) volume.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> unit [[setPlayerVoNVolume]] volume

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the other player's unit

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> volume: [[Number]] - the wanted volume

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_loudPlayer [[setPlayerVoNVolume]] 0.5;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getPlayerVoNVolume]] [[fadeSound]] [[fadeRadio]] [[fadeMusic]]
</value></part></template></root>
